goal: Systemize books with initial cabin books, bamboo→paper→blank book crafting, and writing commands for titles/pages.
decisions: Introduce a persistent book registry with unique IDs, seeded with tutorial, old book, and death note entries stored in the cabin.
Use bamboo (axe) → paper (knife) → blank book (5x paper) as the crafting chain, then bind a blank book by writing a title to create a writable book entry with an ID.
Provide a write command to set a title on a blank book and add/edit pages on owned books by ID; expose book info via examine.
plan: Add book data structures, items, and ownership tracking (player/cabin) plus initial seeded books and bamboo grove spawning.
Implement bamboo chopping, paper crafting, blank book binding, and book creation from blank book via writing a title.
Add write/read flows (title/page writing, examine output), tool wiring, and update todo.json plus tests.
notes: Keep serialization backward compatible with defaults for new fields.
Use ActionSuccess to advance time/energy for writing and crafting steps.
